import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;//const BASE_URL = "http://localhost:4000";
var TUITS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/tuits");var USERS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/users");var api=axios.create({withCredentials:true});export var findAllTuits=function findAllTuits(){return axios.get(TUITS_API).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findTuitById=function findTuitById(tid){return axios.get("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findTuitByUser=function findTuitByUser(uid){return api.get("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid,"/tuits")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var createTuitByUser=function createTuitByUser(uid,tuit){return api.post("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid,"/tuits"),{"tuit":tuit}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var createTuit=function createTuit(uid,tuit){return axios.post("".concat(TUITS_API),uid,tuit).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var updateTuit=function updateTuit(tid,tuit){return axios.post("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid),tuit).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var deleteTuit=function deleteTuit(tid){return axios.delete("".concat(TUITS_API,"/").concat(tid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
